Trade/Device Name(s): Precision® Point of Care Blood Glucose Test Strip
Optium® Point of Care Blood Glucose Test Strip
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Precision Xtra® Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Precision and Optium Point of Care Blood Glucose Test Strips for quantitative measurement of glucose using amperometric biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh neonatal, venous, arterial and fingertip capillary whole blood; for in vitro diagnostic use by healthcare professionals in facilities, or by home users for capillary samples only, as an aid in monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control programs, not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes mellitus
